channel.title: Vector valued functions on Vishvas's notes
channel.description: Recent content in Vector valued functions on Vishvas's notes

item.title: Misc types
item.description: Functions over N: Sequences of vectors Many properties carry over from sequences on R or C. See analysis of functions over fields ref. Convergence The limit corresponds to the limit of projection sequence in each dimension. Sums, inner products, scalar multiples of convergent sequences converge. (Bolzano, Weierstrass): Every bounded sequence has a subsequence which converges. Curve Continuous \(f:R \to X\), where X is a topological space. Plane curves A curve in the Euclidian plane.
